title: Shopping Package
description:
World-class brands and upstart trends are all available in the world's fashion capital. Indulge your inner shopaholic by staying at Frederick. When you book a deluxe room, we'll present you with a $50 AmEx card to either Westfield World Trade Center or Brookfield Place, two of Downtown Manhattan's best shopping locations.

Westfield World Trade Center is Manhattan's newest shopping destination, conveniently located in the iconic Fulton Center. Here, you can browse major clothing brands like Banana Republic and Forever 21, pick up the latest tech at Apple, or dine on sumptious Italian at Eataly. For refined tastes, Westfield has several luxury outlets, including Smythson, Mount Blanc, and Stuart Weitzman. 

Brookfield Place lies along the Hudson River waterfront, in Battery Park City. Stores here showcase New York's status as the pinnacle of the fashion world. Gucci, Michael Kors, Warby Parker, and Saks Fifth Avenue all have locations here. Fuel your shopping binge at their Chef-driven restaurants, like Dig Inn Seasonal Market, Le District, Mighty Quinn's Barbeque, and Starbucks Reserve Bar.

Shop for yourself or shop for your Christmas list. However you need to treat your inner shopaholic, Frederick has you covered with our NYC shopping package.
terms_list:
• Book for stays now through December 31, 2017
  • Not valid for Superior Single room
